conferences.name: Arctic Conference
conferences.description: The world's northernmost Apple developers' conference with one day of workshops, two days of tech talks, sauna, ice swimming, northern lights, and drinks to connect with professionals, organized by Jesse Sipola.
conferences.address: Theatre Rio, Kauppurienkatu 10, 90100 Oulu, Finland

conferences.name: AppDevCon
conferences.description: A conference for app developers, by app developers, organized by egeniq, featuring talks on mobile development including iOS.
conferences.address: Pathé City, Kleine-Gartmanplantsoen 15-19, 1017 RP Amsterdam, Netherlands

conferences.name: SwiftHeroes
conferences.description: A hybrid online and in-person event in Turin, Italy, focusing on Swift development with talks on advanced Swift techniques and networking opportunities.
conferences.address: Lingotto Conference Centre, Via Nizza 280, 10126 Turin, Italy

conferences.name: try! Swift Tokyo
conferences.description: A 2-day conference with a one-day workshop, focusing on AI and Swift/iOS development, bringing together global developers in Tokyo.
conferences.address: Bellesalle Shibuya First, 1-2-20 Higashi, Shibuya-ku, Tokyo 150-0011, Japan

conferences.name: Deep Dish Swift
conferences.description: Chicago’s premier Swift developer conference, organized by Josh Holtz, featuring indie talks, Swift/iOS sessions, live podcasts, and performances.
conferences.address: Loews Chicago O’Hare Hotel, 5300 N River Rd, Rosemont, IL 60018, USA

conferences.name: iOSKONF
conferences.description: The only iOS conference in Macedonia, organized by Monika and her team, featuring talks and workshops on iOS development.
conferences.address: Skopje Marriott Hotel, Plostad Makedonija 7, Skopje 1000, North Macedonia

conferences.name: SwiftCraft
conferences.description: A Swift developers conference in Folkestone, UK, focusing on Swift code craftsmanship, organized by Phil Nash, set in a theater by the English Channel.
conferences.address: Quarterhouse, 49 Tontine St, Folkestone CT20 1BN, United Kingdom

conferences.name: WWDC 2025
conferences.description: Apple's Worldwide Developers Conference, showcasing the latest in iOS, iPadOS, macOS, watchOS, and more, with keynotes, sessions, and hands-on labs.
conferences.address: Apple Park, 1 Apple Park Way, Cupertino, CA 95014, USA

conferences.name: mDevCamp
conferences.description: A mobile development conference powered by Futured, covering iOS and broader mobile trends, with brilliant speakers and a great location in Prague.
conferences.address: Prague, Czech Republic (Venue TBD)

conferences.name: AppsConf X
conferences.description: Russia’s only mobile developer conference, conducted in Russian, focusing on the latest trends in mobile development including iOS.
conferences.address: Moscow, Russia (Venue TBD)

conferences.name: Swift Connection
conferences.description: A Paris-based conference, previously known as FrenchKit, dedicated to Swift, iOS, macOS, and Apple ecosystems.
conferences.address: Théâtre de Paris, 15 Rue Blanche, 75009 Paris, France

conferences.name: SwiftLeeds
conferences.description: A non-profit iOS conference in Leeds, UK, organized by Adam Rush and team, featuring talks, an evening talk show, and new themes.
conferences.address: Leeds Playhouse, Playhouse Square, Quarry Hill, Leeds LS2 7UP, United Kingdom

conferences.name: PragmaConf
conferences.description: Italy’s first international conference dedicated to iOS, macOS, watchOS, visionOS, and tvOS development, organized by #pragma-mark, a non-profit association.
conferences.address: Bologna, Italy (Venue TBD)

conferences.name: iOS Conf SG
conferences.description: A community-voted top iOS developer conference in Singapore, featuring talks and workshops on iOS and Swift development.
conferences.address: Suntec Singapore Convention & Exhibition Centre, 1 Raffles Boulevard, Singapore 039593

conferences.name: Let's visionOS 2024
conferences.description: A conference with invited speakers from around the world, focusing on visionOS, XR products, design, and development.
conferences.address: Beijing, China (Venue TBD)

conferences.name: vOS Conf
conferences.description: A 2-day conference mainly about visionOS and SwiftUI, with an ethical focus, organized by Manu.
conferences.address: Düren, Germany (Venue TBD)

conferences.name: One More Thing
conferences.description: A community-run conference near WWDC, featuring talks, workshops, WWDC-labs-inspired experiences, and events by Paul Hudson and James Dempsey.
conferences.address: Cupertino, California, USA (Venue TBD)

conferences.name: Mobilis in Mobile
conferences.description: A gathering of mobile communities in France, featuring a day of talks on mobile technologies, design, and marketing, not restricted to iOS.
conferences.address: Nantes, France (Venue TBD)

conferences.name: Swift Island
conferences.description: An all-inclusive experimental conference post-WWDC, held on Texel, a UNESCO World Heritage island, focusing on Swift and iOS development.
conferences.address: Texel, Netherlands (Venue TBD)

conferences.name: iOSDevUK
conferences.description: A major iOS developer conference in Aberystwyth, Wales, connecting developers worldwide with talks and networking.
conferences.address: Aberystwyth University, Penglais Campus, Aberystwyth SY23 3FL, United Kingdom

conferences.name: NSSpain
conferences.description: Europe’s longest-running Apple developer conference, focusing on iOS, Swift, and macOS, with talks and workshops in Logroño.
conferences.address: Logroño, Spain (Venue TBD)

conferences.name: SwiftConf
conferences.description: A Swift-focused conference in Cologne, Germany, featuring talks on Swift and iOS development.
conferences.address: Cologne, Germany (Venue TBD)

conferences.name: Server-Side Swift
conferences.description: A framework-independent, non-profit conference in London, focused on server-side Swift development and related topics.
conferences.address: London, United Kingdom (Venue TBD)

conferences.name: Do iOS
conferences.description: A premier iOS developer conference in Amsterdam, featuring talks and workshops on iOS and Swift development.
conferences.address: Nemo Science Museum, Oosterdok 2, 1011 VX Amsterdam, Netherlands
